text: controversy; as, for example, thou thyself art a

speaker: LUCIO
text: wicked villain, despite of all grace.

text: Claudio to prison? ’Tis not so.

speaker: BAWD
text: three days his head to be chopped off.

speaker: LUCIO
text: But, after all this fooling, I would not have it so!

speaker: LUCIO
text: Art thou sure of this?

speaker: BAWD
text: I am too sure of it. And it is for getting Madam

speaker: BAWD

text: How now? What’s the news with you?

text: Yonder man is carried to prison.

text: Well, what has he done?

text: A woman.

text: But what’s his offense?

text: Groping for trouts in a peculiar river.

speaker: BAWD
text: What? Is there a maid with child by him?

speaker: POMPEY
text: No, but there’s a woman with maid by him.

speaker: POMPEY
text: You have not heard of the proclamation, have you?

text: What proclamation, man?

text: All houses in the suburbs of Vienna must be

speaker: POMPEY
text: plucked down.

speaker: BAWD
text: And what shall become of those in the city?

speaker: POMPEY
text: They shall stand for seed. They had gone down

speaker: POMPEY
text: too, but that a wise burgher put in for them.

speaker: BAWD
text: But shall all our houses of resort in the suburbs

speaker: BAWD
text: be pulled down?

speaker: POMPEY
text: To the ground, mistress.

speaker: BAWD
text: Why, here’s a change indeed in the commonwealth!

speaker: BAWD
text: What shall become of me?

speaker: POMPEY
text: Come, fear not you. Good counselors lack no

speaker: POMPEY
text: clients. Though you change your place, you need

speaker: POMPEY
text: not change your trade. I’ll be your tapster still.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Courage. There will be pity taken on you. You that

speaker: POMPEY
text: have worn your eyes almost out in the service, you

speaker: POMPEY
text: will be considered.

speaker: BAWD

speaker: POMPEY
